'''Ernest Borisovich Vinberg''' ({{lang-ru|Эрнест Борисович Винберг}}; born 26 July 1937) is a Russian mathematician, who works on discrete subgroups of Lie groups and [[representation theory]]. He introduced [[Vinberg's algorithm]] and the [[Koecher–Vinberg theorem]].

He is a recipient of the [[Humboldt Prize]].
